sentences.english: The shale beds in between generally deform plastically.
sentences.chinese: 夾在其中的頁岩層通常是塑性變形。

sentences.english: The particular system of timbering depends on the rock formations through which the tunnels pass.
sentences.chinese: 採用何種支護方法取決於井巷穿過的岩層結構。

sentences.english: Camping on a rocky outcrop in Stockholm Archipelag.
sentences.chinese: 斯德哥爾摩羣島上露出地面岩層的野營。

sentences.english: It also induced local plastic crumple of the shale in middle to lower part of Shasan group.
sentences.chinese: 由之誘發的沙三段中下部泥質岩層段局部塑性揉皺。

sentences.english: The Liangshang Formation mudstone is the direct cap rock of the Carboniferous gas pools.
sentences.chinese: 石炭系氣藏的直接蓋層是下二疊統梁山組泥岩層。

sentences.english: Anticlines are arch-shaped folds in which rock layers are upwardly convex.
sentences.chinese: 典型地背斜是岩層向上凸起的褶曲。

sentences.english: Ground movements in the metal mines differ from those occurring in coalmines.
sentences.chinese: 金屬礦山岩層與地表移動有其自身特點。

sentences.english: Dongfengshan gold deposit is occurred in hornstone of Dongfengshan group under iron bearing stratum.
sentences.chinese: 東風山金礦體賦存在含鐵層之下的東風山羣角岩層中。

sentences.english: On Earth natural bridges are the results of wind and water eroding away rock.
sentences.chinese: 在地球上，天然橋樑通常是由風和水侵蝕岩層形成的。

sentences.english: The Tertiary strata belong to soft rock.
Thus, jutting peaks of sheer rock with the rock strata going almost vertical occur.
sentences.chinese: 因此，岩石的峯尖突出，岩層方向幾乎是垂直的。

sentences.english: The latter resulted from the deposition of dark and organic-rich material in the back reef and the lagoon.
sentences.chinese: 後者爲礁後瀉湖相黑色富有機質岩層，厚度較薄。

sentences.english: Drag bits are used most commonly in soft formations .
sentences.chinese: 在鬆軟岩層中最常用的是鋼砂鑽頭。

sentences.english: Lam was waiting on top of a steep rock formation to capture a sunset in North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 林有一次在朝鮮一個陡峭岩層上等待着拍攝日落。

sentences.english: Fault tree analysis for collapse of roadways with fractured surrounding rock and high tectonic stress in jinchuan mine no.
sentences.chinese: 金川二礦區不良岩層採場巷道片幫冒頂事故樹分析。

sentences.english: The Dengying formation encluded carbonate turbidite and gravity sliding layer.
sentences.chinese: 燈影組發育碳酸鹽巖濁積岩層和重力滑動層。
